summary:
With experience in management, cultivating relationships, task - delegation, team building, conflict resolution, time management, & organizational skills, I will be a true benefit to any organization. My passion for people—combined with an understanding of management’s best practices—has contributed to numerous initiatives delivering exceptional results. The positions that compose my employment history and formal education have exposed me to many key facets of positions within this field. My experience has shown that I have effectively handled multiple responsibilities at once with the ability to communicate in various settings. My experience has shown that I have effectively handled multiple responsibilities at once with the ability to communicate in various settings.
Highlights of my experience include…
•	Developing, implementing, and leading process and procedure improvements to enhance efficiency and productivity  
•	Demonstrating superior communication, leadership, problem-solving, and organizational skills, as well as strong program management and team leadership/coordination talent
•	A proactive problem solver and liaison between cross-functional teams
•	Excellent organizational and interpersonal skills with flexibility in strategic thinking
•	Streamlined day-to-day office processes to meet long-term goals

        Additionally, I am prepared for anything that is thrown my way & I am willing to learn & expand my knowledge while facing new challenges.   I am a collaborative team member who enjoys working within a team, as well as working independently to achieve goals.
